title.rendered: CA Fastigheter issues green bonds of SEK 500 million and completes a tender offer and early redemption under outstanding bonds

content.rendered:
CA Fastigheter Aktiebolag (publ) (“CA Fastigheter”) has successfully issued senior unsecured green bonds in an initial amount of SEK 500 million within a framework of SEK 1 billion.

CA Fastigheter intends to apply for admission to trading of the green bonds on the sustainable bond list of Nasdaq Stockholm. In connection with the issue of green bonds, CA Fastigheter has also carried out a tender offer and early redemption under outstanding unsecured bonds 2021/2024.

CA Fastigheter is a family-owned company with over 100 years of experience from the real estate sector with a property portfolio focused on prime locations in Stockholm, Berlin, and regional cities with strong underlying population growth.

CA Fastigheter was advised by Mannheimer Swartling in the transaction.
